snippet: The talks on Sunday will focus on arranging the nations’ first cabinet minister-level meeting in six years.
abstract: North Korea and South Korea will meet for logistical talks in border village of Panmunjom to arrange their first cabinet minister-level meeting in six years; surprise overture by the North unleashes rapid sequence of proposals and counterproposals that raise hopes of a thaw on the Korean Peninsula after months of bellicose language.
lead_paragraph: The talks on Sunday will focus on arranging the nations’ first cabinet minister-level meeting in six years.

headline.seo: South and North Korea Pave Way for Direct Talks
headline.main: South and North Korea Agree to Meet at a Border Village
headline.print_headline: South and North Korea Agree To Meet at a Border Village
